item.title: Jyoti ratha yatra for Raichur District Utsav 2026 flagged off
item.description:
<![CDATA[The district administration flagged off the Jyoti Rathayatra from Karnataka Sangha in Raichur on February 1 to mark the Raichur District Utsav 2026, which will be organized from February 5 to 7 on the campus of University of Agricultural Science (UAS) Raichur.
The ratha (chariot) was decked with various variety of flowers. ASHA and anganawadi workers performed a puja before the chariot was flagged off by Raichurâ€™s Deputy Commissioner Nitish K.
The chariot was taken in a grand procession on the...]]>
item.author: Authors
